descriptions.google-cloud-storage: This was served by a Google Cloud Storage bucket.
descriptions.amz: This node uses Amazon Web Services.
descriptions.google: This node likely uses Google Cloud Platform.
descriptions.heroku: This node is hosted on Heroku.
descriptions.rackspace: This node likely uses Rackspace services.
descriptions.azure: This node is hosted on Microsoft Azure.
descriptions.iis: This node uses (Microsoft) Internet Information Services.
descriptions.traefik: This node uses Traefik as a reverse proxy/load balancer.
descriptions.caddy: This node uses Caddy as a web server.
descriptions.envoy: This node uses Envoy as a proxy.
descriptions.haproxy: This node uses HAProxy as a load balancer.
descriptions.aws-elb: This node uses Amazon Web Services Elastic Load Balancer.
descriptions.google-lb: This node uses Google Cloud Load Balancing.
descriptions.server-timing: The response includes server timing information.
descriptions.xss: This node enables cross-site scripting (XSS) protection.
descriptions.x-frame-options: This node controls if it can be embedded in frames.
descriptions.content-security-policy: This node defines content security policies.
descriptions.x-content-type-options: This node prevents MIME sniffing vulnerabilities.
descriptions.referrer-policy: This node defines how referrers are sent.
descriptions.poweredby: The response discloses the underlying technology used in the x-powered-by header.
descriptions.accept: The request specifies acceptable media types.
descriptions.accept-encoding: The request specifies acceptable content encodings.
descriptions.apikey: The request includes an API key.
descriptions.clientid: The request includes a client ID.
descriptions.userid: The request includes a user ID.
